title: banned
body: i was banned for toxic behavior, and I understand that in my most recent game I was toxic but, how can I not be when I was with 4 other premades that didn't want to help me with my jungle camps, they also take my jg camps as well and when all of them started to flame me I stated the truth that in queue the player with an inappropriate name called "Dogsex" harasses me and says that they are a 4 man premade, and says all of them will report me for playing the new champ, kayn. I really want this account back, I just spent about 55 dollars on this accout for new skins and the new champ please I don't want to lose this account and I understand that I was toxic and if there is a chance that you guys unban me then I will reform and be less toxic in future games if that happens, thanks for at least looking at this if you did....
